rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.25+commit.b61c2a91"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[],"name":"InvalidNonceKey","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"NonceOverflow","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ProtocolNonceNotSupported","type":"error"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"nonceKey","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint64","name":"newNonce","type":"uint64"}],"name":"NonceIncremented","type":"event"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"nonceKey","type":"uint256"}],"name":"getNonce","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint64","name":"nonce","type":"uint64"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"This precompile manages user nonce keys (1-N) while protocol nonces (key 0)      are handled directly by account state. Each account can have multiple      independent nonce sequences identified by a nonce key.","errors":{"ProtocolNonceNotSupported()":[{"details":"Protocol nonce should be accessed through account state, not this precompile"}]},"events":{"NonceIncremented(address,uint256,uint64)":{"params":{"account":"The account whose nonce was incremented","newNonce":"The new nonce value after incrementing","nonceKey":"The nonce key that was incremented"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getNonce(address,uint256)":{"params":{"account":"The account address","nonceKey":"The nonce key (must be > 0, protocol nonce key 0 not supported)"},"returns":{"nonce":"The current nonce value"}}},"title":"INonce - Nonce Precompile Interface","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"InvalidNonceKey()":[{"notice":"Thrown when an invalid nonce key is provided"}],"NonceOverflow()":[{"notice":"Thrown when a nonce value would overflow"}],"ProtocolNonceNotSupported()":[{"notice":"Thrown when trying to access protocol nonce (key 0) through the precompile"}]},"events":{"NonceIncremented(address,uint256,uint64)":{"notice":"Emitted when a nonce is incremented for an account and nonce key"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"getNonce(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the current nonce for a specific account and nonce key"}},"notice":"Interface for managing 2D nonces as per the Tempo Transaction spec","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"lib/tempo-std/src/interfaces/INonce.sol":"INonce"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":tempo-std/=lib/tempo-std/src/"]},"sources":{"lib/tempo-std/src/interfaces/INonce.sol":{"keccak256":"0x22abc9ad788194b145429bcef8bbc71a604a908c25f478f7ddf193270b7b11fc","license":"MIT OR Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://a844bb0e9ad86b692555c8905a35d0339b76bbfae34bcc2d0d20f0d945f0051c","dweb:/ipfs/QmekXGiDvmGWGwFCFmNzzyVtJnrnWvAnzNRrEpmXJp7LiZ"]}},"version":1}

params.nonceKey: The nonce key (must be > 0, protocol nonce key 0 not supported)

getNonce(address,uint256).notice: Get the current nonce for a specific account and nonce key
